name: Shui Yong (Dragon Kings' Courts)
shortLoreBlurb: Shui Yong (Dragon Kings' Courts) is a deities from China associated with river courts, rain. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.
description: Shui Yong (Dragon Kings' Courts) is a deities from China associated with river courts, rain. Appeased with offerings to ensure safe crossings and rain.
